properties.description: Based in Eagle Butte, SD, Akiptan is a national innovator in Native agricultural lending. By leveraging patient capital to strategically catalyze asset building, Akiptan's model grows the largest industry within rural, Indigenous economies. Currently, South Dakota and Montana are Akiptan’s two largest markets.
html_labels:
Akiptan

Based in Eagle Butte, SD, Akiptan is a national innovator in Native agricultural lending. By leveraging patient capital to strategically catalyze asset building, Akiptan's model grows the largest industry within rural, Indigenous economies. Currently, South Dakota and Montana are Akiptan’s two largest markets.

properties.description: Based in Rapid City, SD, Black Hills Community Loan Fund offers a variety of programs and services for entrepreneurs, businesses, individuals, and families across nine Lakota and Dakota Tribes in the He Sapa (Black Hills) region.
html_labels:
Black Hills Community Loan Fund

Based in Rapid City, SD, Black Hills Community Loan Fund offers a variety of programs and services for entrepreneurs, businesses, individuals, and families across nine Lakota and Dakota Tribes in the He Sapa (Black Hills) region.

properties.description: Based in Eagle Butte, SD and serving the Cheyenne River Sioux Reservation, Four Bands is a national leader in innovating financial products to address the racial wealth divide, uniquely leveraging data and peer-to-peer partnership building to impact systems change. Four Bands’ current portfolio supports small businesses, youth entrepreneurship, credit building, and homeownership.
html_labels:
Four Bands Community Fund

Based in Eagle Butte, SD and serving the Cheyenne River Sioux Reservation, Four Bands is a national leader in innovating financial products to address the racial wealth divide, uniquely leveraging data and peer-to-peer partnership building to impact systems change. Four Bands’ current portfolio supports small businesses, youth entrepreneurship, credit building, and homeownership.

properties.description: Based in Hays, MT, Montana Native Growth Fund newly launched fund, Montana Native Growth Fund (MNGF) builds strong, sustainable, Indigenous communities with a whole systems approach to lending. Known for their leadership in home ownership, Montana Native Growth Fund serves the Fort Belknap Reservation and Native Americans in Montana.
html_labels:
Montana Native Growth Fund

Based in Hays, MT, Montana Native Growth Fund newly launched fund, Montana Native Growth Fund (MNGF) builds strong, sustainable, Indigenous communities with a whole systems approach to lending. Known for their leadership in home ownership, Montana Native Growth Fund serves the Fort Belknap Reservation and Native Americans in Montana.

properties.description: Based in Browning, MT and working throughout Montana, NACDC Financial Services removes barriers that exist in Indian Country that prohibit the flow of capital and credit by addressing the critical needs in Native communities.
html_labels:
NACDC Financial Services

Based in Browning, MT and working throughout Montana, NACDC Financial Services removes barriers that exist in Indian Country that prohibit the flow of capital and credit by addressing the critical needs in Native communities.

properties.description: Based in Billings, MT, Native American Development Corporation (NADC) serves Native American people and societies in Montana, Wyoming, North Dakota, South Dakota entrepreneurs, individuals, families, and regions working towards self-sufficiency, economic and social stability through core activity areas of: Technical Assistance; Business Lending; Health and Wellness; and Entrepreneurial Advocacy and Support.
html_labels:
Native American Development Corporation

Based in Billings, MT, Native American Development Corporation (NADC) serves Native American people and societies in Montana, Wyoming, North Dakota, South Dakota entrepreneurs, individuals, families, and regions working towards self-sufficiency, economic and social stability through core activity areas of: Technical Assistance; Business Lending; Health and Wellness; and Entrepreneurial Advocacy and Support.

properties.description: Based in Crow Agency, MT and serving the Crow Nation, Plenty Doors Community Development Corporation (Plenty Doors) creates thriving communities emphasizing a diverse economy while preserving the unique cultural and environmental qualities of the Apsaalooke (Crow People). An emerging fund, Plenty Doors recently launched its lending program to compliment community services.
html_labels:
Plenty Doors Community Development Corporation

Based in Crow Agency, MT and serving the Crow Nation, Plenty Doors Community Development Corporation (Plenty Doors) creates thriving communities emphasizing a diverse economy while preserving the unique cultural and environmental qualities of the Apsaalooke (Crow People). An emerging fund, Plenty Doors recently launched its lending program to compliment community services.

properties.description: Based in Lame Deer, MT, People's Partner for Community Development (PPCD) helps create a stronger reservation economy through strong connections to land, traditional values and cultural history. PPCD provide financial opportunities to stimulate economic development by promoting self-sufficiency, self-determination and an enhanced quality of life for the reservation communities.
html_labels:
People's Partner for Community Development

Based in Lame Deer, MT, People's Partner for Community Development (PPCD) helps create a stronger reservation economy through strong connections to land, traditional values and cultural history. PPCD provide financial opportunities to stimulate economic development by promoting self-sufficiency, self-determination and an enhanced quality of life for the reservation communities.

properties.description: Based in Fort Washakie, WY, Wind River Development Fund supports economic development on and near The Wind River Indian Reservation. A re-emerging fund, Wind River Development Fund leverages private and government partnerships to promote self-sufficiency, self-determination, and an enhanced quality of life for the reservation community.
html_labels:
Wind River Development Fund

Based in Fort Washakie, WY, Wind River Development Fund supports economic development on and near The Wind River Indian Reservation. A re-emerging fund, Wind River Development Fund leverages private and government partnerships to promote self-sufficiency, self-determination, and an enhanced quality of life for the reservation community.
